caption.p: Ordination analysis of the resident species composition and abundance showing differences between invaded and uninvaded controls, respectively, and effect of I. glandulifera planting and removal. A nonmetric multidimensional scaling (NMDS) was performed based on Bray‐Curtis dissimilarity index of plant dry biomass, dimensions 3, stress 0.136, n = 58 plots. Sites are indicated by points with arrows connecting a control treatment with its corresponding plot where I. glandulifera was manipulated. Species are given as crosses, the most frequent ones were labeled with priority. Results of a PERMANOVA testing the differences are given in Table 1. For abbreviations of the species names see Table A1
